Separation and division in ancient times

points.title: The Bridge For All Serves All - The One Truth For All
points.description: The bridge for all serves all. The one truth is for all. All entities serve The Table. All systems honor The Table. All people are served equally. The world...and everything in it...for everybody blessed to live it.
literal_evidence: The bridge for all serves all
The one truth is for all
points.spiritual_meaning: The bridge for all serves all. The one truth is for all. All are equal at The Table. The cards speak for all. We are all one - above and below sea level.

dialect_data.the_one_truth: We are born a miracle. We deserve to live a miracle. Each and every one of us under the Lord's word.
dialect_data.applies_to: All - the world...and everything in it...for everybody blessed to live it
dialect_data.table_principle: All are equal at The Table. The cards speak for all. The one truth is for all.
